name: Tarotoo
description: Tarotoo offers free AI-powered tarot and psychic readings to guide users in life, love, and career decisions.
longDescription: Tarotoo is an innovative platform that combines ancient tarot practices with modern AI technology to provide free online tarot and psychic readings. Its mission is to make tarot accessible and engaging, using animated cards to bring archetypes to life and foster self-discovery. The website serves users seeking insights into personal, romantic, or financial matters through intuitive and interactive experiences. Supported by world-renowned tarot and astrology experts, Tarotoo delivers high-quality content tailored to users’ needs. It also promotes personal development and psychological well-being, drawing on Jungian perspectives to deepen self-reflection. The platform is designed for both beginners and seasoned tarot enthusiasts, requiring no registration for core features.
features: Animated tarot cards create an immersive reading experience, enhancing user engagement and connection with archetypes.
AI-powered tarot readings deliver personalized insights based on user questions, using a classic Past, Present, Future spread.
Free psychic chat provides instant answers on tarot, astrology, numerology, and spirituality, available 24/7.
Multiple tarot spreads, including one-card, three-card, and five-card options, cater to various user needs like love or career guidance.
Expert-authored content by renowned tarot and astrology professionals offers reliable and insightful articles for users.
Yes/No tarot readings provide quick clarity for decision-making with a focus on user energy and intuition.
Multilingual support allows users worldwide to access readings in their preferred language without registration.
Daily tarot readings offer fresh perspectives to empower users to make positive life changes.
Astrological and numerological analyses based on user inputs like name or birthday reveal personality and life path insights.

faqs.question: Is Tarotoo completely free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Tarotoo offers 100% free tarot and psychic readings with no registration required, though premium subscriptions unlock additional features.

faqs.question: How does the AI tarot reading work?
faqs.answer: Users enter a question, select three cards, and the AI interprets them based on a classic Past, Present, Future spread for personalized insights.

faqs.question: Can I ask multiple questions in one session?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can ask as many questions as needed, with each reading tailored to your specific query.

faqs.question: Does Tarotoo predict the future accurately?
faqs.answer: Tarotoo’s readings reflect probable outcomes based on current energy, not definitive predictions, and are intended for guidance and entertainment.

faqs.question: What types of tarot spreads are available?
faqs.answer: Tarotoo offers one-card, three-card, five-card, love, career, and Yes/No spreads, with premium options like the Celtic Cross for subscribers.

faqs.question: Can I access Tarotoo on mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Yes, Tarotoo is available on web browsers and as a mobile app for iOS and Android, offering a seamless experience.

faqs.question: Are the readings suitable for beginners?
faqs.answer: Tarotoo’s intuitive interface and expert content make it accessible for beginners and experienced users alike.

faqs.question: How often can I use the tarot readings?
faqs.answer: You can use Tarotoo’s free tarot readings daily to gain fresh perspectives and guidance.

faqs.question: Does Tarotoo offer human psychic consultations?
faqs.answer: No, Tarotoo provides only AI-powered psychic interactions, not human psychic consultations.
